description: American Spencer Stone tells a French court how he tackled the gunman on the Thalys train in 2015.
title: French Thalys train attacker 'tried to kill me three times'
title_page: French Thalys train attacker 'tried to kill me three times' - BBC News
maintext: Asked if he agreed with the defendant's claim that once he had seen the Americans he decided he did not wish to kill anyone, Mr Stone was quoted as saying: "If he'd wanted to stop he wouldn't have tried to kill me three times."
